channel.title: New Layout
channel.description:
So, I've been meaning to work on a new layout for my website for the longest time and just started making a new one a few days ago.
http://www.pwnds.info/newpwnds/
It will be the replacement for my current layout. The difference between the sites, however, will be basically everything. I'm going to code everything myself; no external scripts.
How does it look thus far? Vedy nice? What can I work on? Thanks.

item.title: New Layout
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“sdouble, post:9, topic:140181”][quote author=Pwnd link=topic=192350.msg1733503#msg1733503 date=1188973617]
…

But li3k total respect for the div layout.

Coordinate positioning saved this layout, hahaha.
…
[/quote]

CSS positioning is my hero. I wouldn’t be in web design without it. I remember having to do it all in html tables and frames and such. It was complete crap.

/cheer css[/quote]I’ve read about it before you told me, but it didn’t click until then

Read full topic

item.title: New Layout
item.dc:creator: @sdouble sdouble
item.description:
@sdouble wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:8, topic:140181”]…

But li3k total respect for the div layout.

Coordinate positioning saved this layout, hahaha.
…[/quote]

CSS positioning is my hero. I wouldn’t be in web design without it. I remember having to do it all in html tables and frames and such. It was complete crap.

/cheer css

Read full topic

item.title: New Layout
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

I totally forgot I even made this thread; shit.

Alright, thanks for the comments. Let me respond to them x]

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:4, topic:140181”]Looks all right. Couple things though.

top.jpg should have been saved as a gif. You could have also either made it into two smaller images, with just the quarter circles on either side. Never been a fan of rounded corners, because they clash with the unrounded edges.[/quote]
I guess if .gif does not sacrifice that much, I’ll get on that. It’s a bitch to put rounded edges on those, btw. And I think it’d look annoying. Meh, maybe I’ll give it a try.

buttonbg.jpg could also have been saved as a gif, and it should have been 1px wide. I think those menu items are a bit tall for the text inside it. And maybe the bar could be extended across the width of the page; it looks sorta empty on the right.
I'll get on that as well. It does look empty, but it might be weird just being solid. Again, I'll look into it.
navtop.jpg should have been a gif, and from the rounded corner, it looks lopsided.
I think that's because I have a sizing issue. I didn't notice that though. Quick, easy fix. Thanks.
The fact that the body background color and the #big background color is the same is slightly annoying
Hah, I thought it was kinda chill. I like the idea of the white border though that Bang Train suggested.
Everything with one color + white + anti-aliasing should have been a gif. Well, basically everything except for the cookie monster could have been a gif. Speaking of which, is that you in the top left corner? Or is that a girl?
Lmfao, if I was in there, that'd be mad hott, but nah :P That's a chick, I believe. I don't know if I was supposed to take that as an insulting comment either, haha.
ID's should be only used once... otherwise it should be a class.
Is that so? :O
I fully intend to brute-force your admin page.
Have fun. ^.^ When you left this comment, the login didn't even work. Plus, there's nothing there of value, haha.
But li3k total respect for the div layout.
Coordinate positioning saved this layout, hahaha.

[quote=“Bang Train, post:6, topic:140181”]OOOO interesting

You started curves. But abandoned them. You have them on cookie monster and the top of the page, yet none of your nav buttons or the menu on the left or even the footer have them. Be consistent please.[/quote]
Again, I thought they’d be annoying, but I’ll look at it.

The Welcome, Projects, Links are the same color as the background. This looks bad. Make them stand out by either different color or take a while outline around everything from the header to the footer.
I'll most likely do this.
The pixel diffrence between the menu on the left and the header is more then the cookie monster pic and the header.
They're different, you're saying? That was intended. I didn't think the cookie monster looked good enough.
The buttons are not links. Only the words. I kept trying to click the blue gradients of the button.......
Yeah, I really wanted to make the whole thing, but now that I see the fix ^.^
The space diffrence of the top of the word Home and Welcome is MUCH more then the space diffrence between the bottom of admin and the top of Projects.
Is that so?
The uhh lululullululululululullululululululullllllllllllllllll seems the be floating. Its not really contained in anything except a big white space.
Yeah? :P I guess a border wouldn't hurt that part.

Thanks again guys.[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:7, topic:140181”][quote author=Bang Train link=topic=192350.msg1731250#msg1731250 date=1188890396]
The buttons are not links. Only the words. I kept trying to click the blue gradients of the button…
[/quote]

True. I believe setting a:link and a:visited display:block should fix it, which may cause some other minor problems which you could easily fix. Then again, if you plan on keeping it unsupported for IE6, you could just do it for a.[/quote]Thanks :]

Read full topic

item.title: New Layout
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Bang Train:

The buttons are not links. Only the words. I kept trying to click the blue gradients of the button…

True. I believe setting a:link and a:visited display:block should fix it, which may cause some other minor problems which you could easily fix. Then again, if you plan on keeping it unsupported for IE6, you could just do it for a.

Read full topic

item.title: New Layout
item.dc:creator: @Bang_Train Bang Train
item.description:
@Bang_Train wrote:

OOOO interesting

You started curves. But abandoned them. You have them on cookie monster and the top of the page, yet none of your nav buttons or the menu on the left or even the footer have them. Be consistent please.

The Welcome, Projects, Links are the same color as the background. This looks bad. Make them stand out by either different color or take a while outline around everything from the header to the footer.

The pixel diffrence between the menu on the left and the header is more then the cookie monster pic and the header.

The buttons are not links. Only the words. I kept trying to click the blue gradients of the button…

The space diffrence of the top of the word Home and Welcome is MUCH more then the space diffrence between the bottom of admin and the top of Projects.

The uhh lululullululululululullululululululullllllllllllllllll seems the be floating. Its not really contained in anything except a big white space.

Thats all I can really see on the main homepage right now.

Read full topic

item.title: New Layout
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

You can make a layout much better than I can, but I don’t like it man. It just doesn’t seem to mesh well, you know?

The Menu titles seem a little too big and the link titles in the menu titles seem a little small. The big blue buttons don’t seem to go well with the rest of the layout. Seems a little too blue.

Hope that critique helps.

Read full topic

item.title: New Layout
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Looks all right. Couple things though.

top.jpg should have been saved as a gif. You could have also either made it into two smaller images, with just the quarter circles on either side. Never been a fan of rounded corners, because they clash with the unrounded edges.

buttonbg.jpg could also have been saved as a gif, and it should have been 1px wide. I think those menu items are a bit tall for the text inside it. And maybe the bar could be extended across the width of the page; it looks sorta empty on the right.

navtop.jpg should have been a gif, and from the rounded corner, it looks lopsided.

The fact that the body background color and the #big background color is the same is slightly annoying

Everything with one color + white + anti-aliasing should have been a gif. Well, basically everything except for the cookie monster could have been a gif. Speaking of which, is that you in the top left corner? Or is that a girl?

ID’s should be only used once… otherwise it should be a class.

I fully intend to brute-force your admin page.

But li3k total respect for the div layout.

Oh, and fellixombc, nice sig.

Read full topic

item.title: New Layout
item.dc:creator: @N00b1 N00b1
item.description:
@N00b1 wrote:

its pretty cool thou im not a fan of that type of layout… there is something that is kicking me in the balls but i cant work out what… ill get back to you on that 1

Read full topic
